description:
• We will find various high-level sporting events held in an Olympic stadium: high jump, javelin throw, 400-meter hurdles, pole vault, hammer or discus throw and many more.

• Each event has its own mechanics when it comes to achieving its objective: balance, speed, timing and reflexes with the quicktime event system (QTE).

• Unlock no less than 60 bizarre and unusual athletes. With them you can have a laugh…imagine controlling Santa Claus or the vampire trying to do a pole vault, also a diver with fins, a superhero with a cape, a pink bunny costume and many more.

• Various game modes including One Vs One to challenge your best friend or family member. With a world ranking and friends ranking for each event (leaderboard), and with an Olympic podium to celebrate your great achievements and Olympic medals.
name: Sportitions’24
